Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 12th overall pick, by Capital City in 1961...
Earned first career win on 8/21/1962...
Had first career hit (triple) on 4/11/1964, off Karl Mcmullin (LP)...
Traded from Capital City to Northeastern on 2/5/1969 (Going to NE: P W. Flanagan, P R. Hurley. Going to CC: P J. Coury)...
Signed as a free agent by Pittsburgh on 2/6/1972 to a 4-year deal worth $4,500,000 per year...
Traded from Pittsburgh to Toledo on 3/2/1975 (Going to TOL: P W. Flanagan, RF F. Robinson. Going to PIT: P A. Hawks, RF A. Sinclair)...
Signed as a free agent by Longport on 2/5/1976 to a 3-year deal worth $4,111,111 per year...
Was selected to the 1976 Allstar game...
Signed as a free agent by Bay City on 2/9/1983 to a 1-year deal worth $1,491,600 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Bay City on 2/4/1984 to a 1-year deal worth $2,125,200 per year...
Won World Championship with Bay City in 1984...
Released by Bay City on 4/7/1985...
